Summary: i seen a orange orb approaching us it looked very bright waited for sound heard none,running for my phone to record lost sight of it then a second appeared on same flight path.i recorded it
trends: There have been 66 other sightings in Jacksonville
There were no other sightings in Jacksonville on or around December 24th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsme and my wife and daughter were on the back porch,thats where we smoke so i looked up and noticed a bright orange light or orb it came across the sky seemed odd i walked into the yard to watch it and waited for some type of sound to come from it and it never did i wanted to record it my phone was inside so i got my wifes phone started recordind the area that it was in it went into some low clouds i kept waiting for it to come into the open again because there was a break in the clouds where it was headed then my daughter screamed theres another one so i focused on it no sound looked orange in no real hurry at all on the same path as the first one traveled i recorded it as long as i could then ran through the house to get in the front yard for a better view but it was gone i looked for a while but did not see them again,,it was NOT planes no way no how i was highly excited to see this and a little scared for some reason when my mind realized it was no plane well that could only mean one thing if its not ours then who is flying this,that gave me a really bad feeling,im super excited now to be able to witness such a event and have a weird feeling of its true we are not alone,the object went into the clouds and i lost sight of it,,there has to be other witnesses the object was not in a hurry and either is was very large or either lower than than im thinking it was, it was very bright and orange and the second one was on the same path just futher behind it,its christmas eve my wife is saying im obcessing with this i cant find my computer cord and have to put christmas out for my children you can contact me for video or email me a email info to send to sorry,but i do have it
